name: Missing (Super8BitRafa)
description: Super8bitRafa is a Latinx game developer and visual artist from the Monterey California area. Born and raised in the culturally rich Salinas Valley, Rafa has thrived in his artistic endeavors and has always aimed to explore the human subconscious through imagination and aesthetic design with practices inspired by the early surrealist movements. Constantly striving to explore new avenues of art and modern culture, 8bit shifts his focus to interactive mediums.
